title: Bourbon Chocolate Fondue Recipe
full_text:
Bourbon Chocolate Fondue Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
1 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
heavy cream
12
ounces
semisweet chocolate
, finely chopped
3
tablespoons
bourbon
Accompaniments: cubed pound cake,
marshmallows
, cigarette wafer cookies, strawberries, cut fruit
Directions
Heat cream in medium saucepan over medium-high heat until just simmering. Reduce heat to low and stir in chocolate until smooth. Stir in bourbon. Serve with desired accompaniments.
Desserts
Chocolate
